Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in the same case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed following Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers when SW-Reviewer Agreed does not occur within 7 days
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time for the segment starting at Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and ending at SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include a major revision cycle
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 measured until the next reviewer-related outcome (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Selection is now due in overdue reviewer assignment paths
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer No Response in cases where no agreement is recorded afterward
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and the subsequent Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 when SW-Reviewer Agreed is delayed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 was issued, compared to cases where it was not
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to be followed by Assign a Different Editor in complex reviewer assignment variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Agreed in traces that include Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in end-to-end review cycles leading to editorial decisions
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
